settings.details: With Shop Pay Installments, you split your purchases into four equal, interest-free payments — with no additional, hidden, or late fees, and no impact to your credit score.

settings.titlepro: Paying with Shop Pay is as easy as 1, 2, 3!
settings.prodesx: Finally, you don’t have to pay for your fast all at once. Happy days! Shop Pay makes it easy to find a payment plan that suits you so you can focus on getting your fast started.
settings.setdesc:
Your first payment will be due at checkout.
The next 3 remaining installments will be automatically charged every 2 weeks to your card saved on Shop Pay. And don't worry, you'll get an email reminder before each payment to keep you in the know.

settings.title: What is Shop Pay and how does it work?
settings.text: Shop Pay helps you check out faster when you’re shopping in participating stores by automatically filling in your saved payment and shipping information when you enter your email address at checkout.

settings.title: What is the option to pay in installments on Shop Pay?
settings.text: When you check out with Shop Pay, you have the option to pay in installments. Installments are a flexible payment option that can help you invest in larger purchases up to $1000 by dividing your purchase amount into four equal, biweekly, and interest-free payments. There are no additional fees.

settings.title: How does the payment schedule work?
settings.text: Your first payment is due at checkout or up to 2 weeks after your purchase for approved customers. The next 3 remaining installments are automatically charged to your card saved on Shop Pay every 2 weeks.

settings.title: What if I can’t pay a Shop Pay installment?
settings.text: Login to your shop pay account and contact them for further assistance. ProLon and L-Nutra do not manage your installment payments, they are provided by Shop Pay and underwritten by Affirm. You may also visit https://shoppay.affirm.com/help/s/ for additional information.

settings.title: Are there any additional costs to use this service?
settings.text: There are no additional charges, interest rates, or late fees.

settings.title: When will my items be delivered if I use a Shop Pay installment?
settings.text: Items in your order will be delivered normally, depending on the shipping service selected at checkout.

settings.title: Is there a limit to how much I can spend on a single transaction using Shop Pay?
settings.text: Shop Pay installments can be used for purchases between $50– $1,000.

settings.mdesc: I discovered ProLon last January and I have been doing it consistently ever since then. It is a really great reset for your body, especially after holidays. It has so many different benefits, it curbs sugar cravings and helps me manage portion control.
settings.author: - WHITNEY

settings.mdesc: Not only can I stick to ProLon when I can’t stick to other diets, it helps jumpstart into whatever diet that I am planning to do after. Prolon motivates me... it just works for me.
settings.author: -KIMBERLY

settings.mtitle: I loved it... my wife loved it!
settings.mdesc: I think this program is actually a perfect example of practicing self-discipline. Anyone that wants to get batter in that aspect of their lives, while improving overall physical health, I think ProLon is a great opportunity to do just that.
settings.author: -DAVID

settings.mdesc: How are you going to feel after 5 days... Amazing! No belly bloat, you are going to lose weight, have more energy, and all your cravings for sugar... GONE! You have to give this a try.
settings.author: -AUDREY

settings.title: You may not realize it but you’re already fasting.
settings.details:
Every night when you go to sleep, your body goes into a fasting state. The human body was
designed to fast but modern life intervened. Tap into your natural instincts with ProLon.

settings.title: Cellular Clean-up
settings.description: ProLon supports the body’s natural process of cellular clean-up, triggered when it’s in a prolonged fasting state.

settings.title: Fat Focused Weight Loss
settings.description: Kickstart weight loss (on average 5 pounds), especially belly fat, while protecting lean body mass.

settings.title: Enhance Clarity
settings.description: Customers report feeling greater focus and clarity toward the end and after completing the fast.

settings.title: More Energy
settings.description: The majority of ProLon users surveyed said they had more energy after completing the fast.
